name: ALIEN INVASION ESCAPE!
description:
Alien Invasion Escape is a game where you are a player stuck in space in the middle of an alien invasion with a broken space ship. To escape, you need to collect 25 diamonds before they destroy your ship in 120 seconds. Good luck!

*** When the game ends, and you press replay - if it is stuck just press ESC to pause and unpause and the game will run like normal :)

Credits:

Sprites: Free 2D Mega Pack from Unity Asset Store

Sound effects: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

Main Menu Music: SPACE - Symphony  from https://my-free-mp3.vip/

Game Level Music: Background Music Soundtrack - Cinematic Electronic Futuristic Action Energetic Theme 001 from  https://myfreemp3.vip/
